hypothesis_content.title: Gas Compression → ETH Volatility Expansion
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas fees compress to extreme lows (<20 gwei) for 3+ consecutive days during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, ETH price will experience >8% absolute move (up or down) within the next 5 trading days as suppressed volatility releases.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas indicates reduced network activity and potential complacency. Historically, such periods precede volatility expansions as catalysts (news, large transactions) trigger outsized moves in thin activity environments.
entry_conditions: BTC dominance change < ±1% over past 3 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH price moves ±8% from entry (directional agnostic)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH price remains within ±3% after 5 days

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If ETH remains range-bound (±5%) for 7+ days following extreme gas compression during neutral regimes.
